title: Renovated 2 Bedroom in West LA/Westside**SS Appliances**Playground
posting_body: ['Experience 3700 Sepulveda, the ideal work from home community offering newly renovated apartment homes.', '3700', "Sepulveda features recreation facilities which include a swimming pool with a spa, surrounded by an extensive sundeck and BBQ'S.", 'We have a Basketball Court, Soccer Field, Playground, Bocce Ball, Putting Green, two Pickleball Courts, a Lounge room, Fitness Center, and a Dry Sauna.', 'The building offers laundry rooms on each floor and covered gated parking.', 'There are six customized plans to choose from, containing split-level singles, one bedroom, one bedroom with Den and two bedrooms.', 'All apartments are air conditioned and have a fireplace, private patio or balcony, refrigerator, gas stove, and dishwasher.', 'Amenities:', '- Complimentary iMac Computers & Printer', '- Complimentary Wireless Internet', '- Onsite Security', '- Community Laundry Room On Each Floor', '- Fitness Center', '- Direct Access to 10 & 405 Freeways', '- Soccer Field', '- Secure Bicycle Storage', '- Onsite Maintenance Services', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Updated Kitchens', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Air Conditioning', '- Gas Fireplaces In All Units', '- Onsite Management Team', '- Close to USC, UCLA, LMU, & SMC', '- Playground', '- Gated Underground Parking', '- Shaker Wood Cabinets', '- Sauna', '- Pickleball', '- Community BBQs', '- Rich Rubber Wood Plank Floors', '- Heated Swimming Pool & Spa', '- Putting Green', '- Spacious Storage & Closet Space', '- Community Fire Pits', '- Community Lounge', '- Spacious Balconies & Patios', '- Basketball Court', '- Package Room', '- Controlled Access', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Location:', '3700 South Sepulveda Boulevard Los Angeles, CA', 'Price & availability are conditional.', 'Square Feet is approximate.']
